concept.title: Feature APIs
concept.shortdesc: Automate the process using the Feature APIs

conbody.p: Use the Feature APIs to automate the process by which content is Featured. For example, when creating a Live Blog or Comment App, Feature all content posted by a selected moderator to steer the conversation, and establish consistency within the stream.
Livefyre offers both Feature and Unfeature APIs.
